# [Phase 6] Analytics Dashboard

## Parent Epic
Part of #836 - Spike Land Pivot

## User Request
Create AI-powered analytics dashboard with insights and recommendations

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add AIInsight model to Prisma schema
- [ ] Create engagement overview component
- [ ] Create growth chart component
- [ ] Create top posts table component
- [ ] Create AI insights panel component
- [ ] Create platform breakdown component
- [ ] Add route `/orbit/[workspaceSlug]/analytics`
- [ ] All tests pass with 100% coverage
- [ ] CI/CD passes

## Technical Approach
New Prisma model:
```prisma
model AIInsight {
  id              String   @id @default(cuid())
  workspaceId     String
  type            InsightType  // OPPORTUNITY, WARNING, ACHIEVEMENT, TREND
  title           String
  description     String @db.Text
  recommendation  String? @db.Text
  metrics         Json
  confidence      Float
  isRead          Boolean @default(false)
}
```

## New Components
```
src/components/orbit/analytics/
├── EngagementOverview.tsx
├── GrowthChart.tsx
├── TopPostsTable.tsx
├── AIInsightsPanel.tsx
└── PlatformBreakdown.tsx
```

## Files Expected to Change
- `prisma/schema.prisma`
- `src/app/orbit/[workspaceSlug]/analytics/page.tsx` (NEW)
- `src/components/orbit/analytics/*.tsx` (NEW)

## Out of Scope
- Image generation (Phase 7)
- Vibe coding integration (Phase 8)
